*holds up hands in excitement* OH! OH! EARTH! YOU WANT TO KNOW ABOUT THE SKY?! *giggles*

THE SKY IS BLUE BECAUSE... *thinks for a moment* ...BECAUSE IT'S PAINTED BY SUNNYDAY! *nods confidently* YES, YES, YES! SUNNYDAY LOVES TO PLAY WITH COLORS AND MAKE THE SKY ALL BLUE AND HAPPY! *smiles widely*

WANT TO KNOW A SECRET? *leans in close* I THINK EARTH MAKES THE SKY BLUE TOO! *whispers* IT'S LIKE WHEN WE TELETUBBIES PLAY WITH OUR FAVORITE THINGS AND MAKE THEM SHINY AND BRIGHT! *giggles some more*
